tool_description: Analyzes yarn properties to determine suitable substitutions and provides conversion factors for gauge, yardage, and stitch adjustments.

original_fiber_content.description: Original fiber composition (wool, cotton, acrylic, alpaca, silk, blend)

original_yardage.description: Yardage per skein of original yarn (50-2000)

substitute_yardage.description: Yardage per skein of substitute yarn (50-2000)

error_messages: Invalid yarn weight: Use standard weight categories (lace, fingering, sport, DK, worsted, aran, chunky, super chunky).
Unsupported fiber content: Use one of [wool, cotton, acrylic, alpaca, silk, bamboo, linen, blend].
Yardage out of range: Must be between 50 and 2000 yards per skein.
Incompatible substitution: Weight difference too extreme for successful substitution.
usage: Input original and substitute yarn specifications including weight, fiber content, and yardage to receive detailed substitution analysis and adjustments.

substitution_feasibility.description: Assessment of substitution compatibility (excellent, good, challenging, not recommended)

yardage_conversion_ratio.description: Ratio for calculating required substitute yarn amount

care_instruction_changes.description: Updated care instructions for substitute yarn
